post.body: in taxi on way home damaged my back earlier
just left gp damaged my back
tres useful, my pen and camera didnt capture everything
the diamond I got on photo on flickr, but i didnt get too much I could say apart from it was nice. Sorry 2 all webby ppl I missed
still there is always the Advanced Products Group
works for me can drop into Foxs Court 3ish/
let me know whens good for that coffee next week?
c u tomorrow (^_^), Fiona said hi
perhaps or even further East
its very crowded, i'd go further east
me
anywhere nice?
its good vampires can roam freely culling morons
no its the format of retweets on Twibble, retweeted jemima kiss' number change
no I didn't charge them I have a creative commons licence on all my pictures
managed to get myself up and running in time to go see The Prodigy
got so used to dodging the spam filter at work
@jamesdotwarren who flashed her norks in New York?
congrats http://ping.fm/eqDiN
@whatleydude Wallander is the mutt's nuts, its grim and dark beneath a veil of civility just like Northern Europe
I'll leave that opportunity to you, see you tomorrow, sorry manic with something at the moment
bit of cre8ive licence but what the hell (^_^)
and if you have a hankering for good Japanese canteen food try the restaurant in the basement of Sogo dept store in Causeway Bay
I can recommend Pacific Coffee Company as a good independent coffee chain out there & L16 restaurant in middle of Hong Kong Park
name names (^_^)
LOL - I just wish they would have thought more carefully about their questionnaire design, clients eh who'd want them?
dear at half the price, makes you feel special doesn't it
so its a research phishing scam (^_^)
yes in the late 80s to mid 90s I played a fair bit in Liverpool and the north of England, play a bit now when I get the chance
OMG Le Bateau that is a blast from the past, I used to know the manager there well and dj'ed there a couple of times in the 90s
and the result was Stevie Wonder (I'm hoping Superstition rather than Ebony and Ivory)
niiice just sent the link to the whole office here and giving it a whirl, its taking a while to digest my account data
here's my reading list sorted by category: http://www.bloglines.com/public/renaissancechambara
do you use last.fm if thats the case then feel free to raid my profile, username gedcarroll
sounds similar to my crazy shieet
its more that people don't have much else to talk about and have a vicious hangover from overindulgence
kick their ass
